ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'Shall I inform you of the greatest losers in their actions?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "Shall I tell you whose labour will be wasted?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say, (O Muhammad): "Shall We tell you who will be the greatest losers in respect of their works?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), tell them, "Should I tell you who will face the greatest loss as a result of their deeds?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “Shall we inform you whose are the most failed works?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Shall We tell you the greatest losers in respect of (their) deeds"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Shall We inform you of the greatest losers in (their) deeds?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'Shall We tell you who will be the greatest losers in their works?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Shall We inform you who will be the greatest losers by their works?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "Shall I tell you of those who will lose the most through their actions?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: shall I declare unto you the greatest losers in respect of works?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Shall we inform you who are the biggest losers in their works?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "Shall we tell you of those who lose most in respect of their deeds?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "Shall We tell you the greatest losers in respect of (their) deeds?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Shall we tell you of those who are the greatest losers in deeds'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “Shall We inform you of the greatest losers in their works?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, [O Muhammad], "Shall we [believers] inform you of the greatest losers as to [their] deeds?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:103] Say: ‘Shall We inform you who will be the greatest losers in [regard to] their works? (al-akhsarīna a‘mālan, a specification that happens to correspond to that which is specifically meant); and these [losers] are described in His words [as being]:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) O Muhammad: (Shall We inform you who will be the greatest losers by their works) in the Hereafter?
